abstract.para: A dataset containing all occurrences available in GBIF matching the query: { "TaxonKey" : [ "is Haliotis kamtschatkana Jonas, 1845" ] } The dataset includes records from the following constituent datasets. The full metadata for each constituent is also included in this archive: 6480 records from Abundance of Rocky Reef Fishes, Invertebrates and Algae, Reef Check California (RCCA), 2006 - 2017 1 records from Collection Mollusca SMF 10 records from Canadian Museum of Nature Mollusc Collection 9 records from Molluscan specimen database of Kanagawa Prefectural Museum of Natural History 1 records from Field Museum of Natural History (Zoology) Invertebrate Collection 44 records from UF Invertebrate Zoology 12 records from University of California Museum of Paleontology 3 records from Mollusca (Luomus) 1 records from Natural History Museum Aarhus Malacology Collection 1 records from Gastropoda collection (TSZG) The Arctic University Museum of Norway 44 records from Galiano Island BC Canada Marine Zoology 1893–2021 8 records from Royal Belgian Institute of Natural Sciences Mollusc collection 1 records from Gastropod Specimens of the Yamagata Prefectural Museum 38 records from CAS Invertebrate Zoology (IZ) 120 records from LACM Malacology 101 records from Gwaii Haanas Invertebrates (OBIS Canada) 3 records from Biologiezentrum Linz 34 records from International Barcode of Life project (iBOL) 7 records from LACM Invertebrate Paleontology 2 records from bmhs_weatherheadshell_collection 38 records from Museum of Comparative Zoology, Harvard University 4 records from Invertebrate Zoology Division, Yale Peabody Museum 3 records from Recent Invertebrates Specimens 1 records from Collection Malakologie - SNSD 190 records from Ocean Genome Legacy Collection 16 records from MAL 14 records from UAM Invertebrate Collection (Arctos) 1 records from Museo Argentino de Ciencias Naturales "Bernardino Rivadavia" (MACN). Invertebrates National Collection (MACNIn) 6 records from University of Victoria - Zooarchaeology Lab Collection 22 records from NatureServe Network Species Occurrence Data 4 records from Natural History Museum (London) Collection Specimens 26 records from BMSM Bailey-Matthews National Shell Museum 1 records from SysTax - Zoological Collections 8 records from RBINS DaRWIN 3 records from Natural History Museum Rotterdam - Specimens 2 records from NHMD Invertebrate Zoology Collection 57 records from NMNH Extant Specimen Records (USNM, US) 2 records from Invertebrates excl. Entomology at the Natural History Museum of Denmark 1 records from Molluscus specimens of Toyohashi Museum of Natural History 3 records from SIO Benthic Invertebrate Collection 2 records from Auburn University Museum of Natural History Mollusks 1 records from Museu de Ciències Naturals de Barcelona: MCNB-Malac 2 records from Mollusca specimens of Manazuru Shell Museum 4 records from SDNHM Paleontology Collection 1 records from Mollusca specimens of Okinawa Prefectural Museum & Art Museum 13 records from INSDC Sequences 3 records from CHAS Malacology Collection (Arctos) 2 records from SDSM Invertebrate Collections 1 records from Bernice P. Bishop Museum 38 records from Delaware Museum of Natural History – Mollusks 4 records from Invertebrate fossil collection of National Museum of Nature and Science 1 records from Biodiversitätsdatenbank Salzburg 9 records from DMNS Marine Invertebrate Collection (Arctos) 17 records from Naturalis Biodiversity Center (NL) - Mollusca 1 records from FBIP:ELM: Malacology Collections 484 records from iNaturalist Research-grade Observations
